answerText: determinant[10] Elementary row operations can be used to find one of these sets of vectors for a matrix's row space or column space. This is a linearly independent set of vectors which spans a vector space.
heading: MUT |2014 | 1 | 10 | Science | Math | College
subject: Science
question: Question: Sarrus' Rule is a shortcut method for computing this operation for a 3x3 matrix. For 10 points each: [10] Name this operation which can be determined for an n-dimensional square matrix recursively via cofactor expansion. For a 2x2 matrix with first row (a,b) and second row (c,d), this operation yields ad minus bc.
